text.tspan: Ensures a 45-degree angle for the hypoenuse
Knowing only A and B, we can find C and D by
of Extended⊿bco into the Pythagorean equation
for Compressed ⊿ado and solving for C.
This gives us a formula for C in terms of A and B.
Since we have A and B, we can calculate C and D.
o = Origin; center of sear rod
A (oa): Sear Center to Trigger Pin Center
D (bc, ad): Trigger Bar Pin Distance
Look nigga, you fit the description.
This is dedicated to potential victims,
too much bitchin' get yo ass
